entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
